description:
Conspiracy theory or truth theory? I have known about the corruption for years but just recently decided to speak up about it a little bit. Everyone I had previously spoken to about the elites, the government lies and everything being fabricated, ALWAYS thought I was a crazy conspiracy theorist so I stopped speaking up. However, recently, I feel compelled to speak UP. Once you start learning about everything that’s happening behind the scenes - you suddenly realise you can’t have normal conversations anymore. Everything is an illusion. You see signs everywhere.⁣
⁣
A lot of what we have always been told & taught just doesn’t add up. There is SO much misinformation out there. Use your brain, intellect & intuition to find your answers.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Question everything. Don’t believe blindly. ⁣⁣
What’s the distraction?⁣⁣
Are there hidden agendas?⁣⁣
It is so much easier to fool people than it is to convince people that they have been fooled.⁣⁣
A smalllllll list of things you can watch & research to wake up:⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Out of Shadows documentary - it shows how the media uses CIA tactics to manipulate the masses. Exposing Hollywood & mainstream media⁣⁣
Fall of the Cabal⁣⁣
Dark to light ⁣⁣
WikiLeaks - Podesta Emails⁣⁣
WikiLeaks - Hilary Clinton’s Emails⁣⁣
Pizzagate ⁣⁣
Adrenochrome⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Don’t use google to find your information - change your search engine to DuckDuckGo as google censors everything. These reveals are shocking. Research, research & research. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Despite all of the chaos, there is so much good happening behind the scenes, it just isn’t being broadcast on the media and I doubt it ever will be. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
The old paradigm - based on deception, is literally crumbling before our eyes.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
We are transitioning into the Age of Aquarius. A paradigm of unity & abundance. The transition period is hard, tiring & can be worrying but don’t let fear or worry get to you. I am currently an exhausted mess hahaha but it’s all part of the plan. Trust it 🙌🏻 ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Things currently look dark & messy but the future is bright. Trust the divine plan. The biggest truth bomb in history is about to drop. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
The world is waking up. 2020 - The Great Awakening. Buckle up & enjoy the ride 🌟
